entry.title: Thursday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. Fog patches developing before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain or freezing rain. High plus 5 with temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning in the morning then changing to freezing rain late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating late in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High plus 5 with temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow or freezing rain. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to snow mixed with ice pellets in the evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023
